name: Gujrati Thali
description: A delightful assortment of traditional Gujarati dishes, offering a perfect blend of sweet, spicy, and tangy flavors.

name: Panjabi Thali
description: A hearty meal packed with rich, creamy curries and freshly made bread, representing the bold flavors of Punjab.

name: South Indian Thali
description: A complete South Indian meal with rice, sambar, rasam, and various spicy and tangy accompaniments.

name: Bahubali thali
description: A massive feast with an extravagant selection of dishes, perfect for those with a big appetite.
